attributes.action: sack any politician who says they will do one thing and then does the opposite.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many politicians, if not all, have promised that they will not do something (ie introduce top up fees for students) and then they go back on what they say and do it anyway, as if no one will notice.  It is a disgrace that they are elected on a promise and then don't keep it.  In any other job this would be gross misconduct and would result in dismissal.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
